name: OUTNUMBERED - A Puzzle Game to connect Numbers
name_original: OUTNUMBERED - A Puzzle Game to connect Numbers
description:
Time to get Outnumbered !!
This is not just another number game,its a unique game where you have to connect as many same numbers as possible and form a bigger number and then double tap to bank them if the total is more than 20.
You will Love Banking with us ! ;)
Three Modes :
- BANK 20 (easy)
- BANK 30 (moderate)
- BANK 40 (difficult)
Lets see if you can beat your high score and compete against the world on game center !
